title: Saikyou Donbei x Hanma Baki: Saikyou no Dongitsune Genrutsutsu

synonyms: Strongest Donbei x Hanma Baki: The Strongest Dongitsune Apperas
alternative_titles.ja: 最強どん兵衛×範馬刃牙「最強のどんぎつね現るッッ」

synopsis:
Nissin has teamed up with Baki Hanma for a new anime commercial that promotes the brand's Saikyou Donbei (The Strongest Donbei) cup noodles, which have thicker noodles than the regular Donbei products among other features.

(Source: anitrendz)
